cab.content: his Document is the Property of His Britannic Majesty's Government.)ited by the Secretary of State for India.SECRET.Bruin Viceroy, 10th October 1917. (Received 1.30 p.m.)- Secret. Weekly report. North-West Frontier quiet. No change in general military situation in Afghanistan or India except for Bihar where riot has broken out in Shahabad district in connection with Bakra Id festival. Detachments of troops have been sent to disturbed area and situation is reported to he in hand though various Hindu mobs are still looting.
